entries.original: Consolidated from 34 tiered agents to 28 unified, specialized agents
entries.translation: 34개의 계층형 에이전트를 28개의 통합된 전문 에이전트로 통합

entries.original: New agents: debugger, verifier, style-reviewer, quality-reviewer, api-reviewer, performance-reviewer, dependency-expert, test-engineer, quality-strategist, product-manager, ux-researcher, information-architect, product-analyst
entries.translation: 새로운 에이전트: debugger, verifier, style-reviewer, quality-reviewer, api-reviewer, performance-reviewer, dependency-expert, test-engineer, quality-strategist, product-manager, ux-researcher, information-architect, product-analyst

entries.original: MCP Team Workers bridge daemon for distributed workflows
entries.translation: 분산 워크플로우를 위한 MCP 팀 워커 브리지 데몬

entries.original: Atomic task claiming with O_EXCL locks (replaces sleep+jitter)
entries.translation: O_EXCL 잠금을 사용한 원자적 작업 클레임 (sleep+jitter 대체)

entries.original: Security hardening: FD leak fix, path traversal prevention
entries.translation: 보안 강화: FD 누수 수정, 경로 탐색 방지

entries.original: Resilience: hybrid orchestration, git worktrees, observability
entries.translation: 복원력: 하이브리드 오케스트레이션, git worktrees, 관찰성

entries.original: Rewritten following Anthropic's official prompting best practices
entries.translation: Anthropic의 공식 프롬프트 모범 사례에 따라 재작성

entries.original: XML behavioral tags, calm language, comprehensive tool/skill reference
entries.translation: XML 행동 태그, 차분한 언어, 포괄적인 도구/기술 참조

entries.original: Merged: local-skills-setup -> skill, learn-about-omc -> help, ralplan/review -> plan
entries.translation: 병합: local-skills-setup -> skill, learn-about-omc -> help, ralplan/review -> plan

entries.original: Ralplan native Plan Mode approval gate (#448, #463)
entries.translation: Ralplan 네이티브 계획 모드 승인 게이트 (#448, #463)
